mandelbrot

Class ComplexSet

  • java.lang.Object
    • mandelbrot.ComplexSet

  • public class ComplexSet
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    John Bannister Instances of this class represent the set of numbers that make up a portion of the complex plane. Owns 360000 instances of ComplexValue.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int COLS
      size of the set
      private ComplexValue[][] complexSet
      a 2D array of ComplexValues that span the range of this set
      private static int DEFAULT_X_OFFSET
      allows the graphic to initially appear in the middle of the paint area, i.e., zero not quite in the middle
      private static int DEFUALT_Y_OFFSET
      allows the graphic to initially appear in the middle of the paint area, i.e., zero not quite in the middle
      private double maxImaginary
      the greatest imaginary value this set covers
      private double maxReal
      the greatest real value this set covers
      private double minImaginary
      the least imaginary value this set covers
      private double minReal
      the least real value this set covers
      static int ROWS
      size of the set
      private int xOffset 
      private int yOffset 
      private double zoom
      our image is a port-view onto a part of the complex plane.
      private double zoomStep
      our image is a port-view onto a part of the complex plane.

      • maxReal

        private double maxReal
        the greatest real value this set covers

      • zoom

        private double zoom
        our image is a port-view onto a part of the complex plane. Which part is in view is controlled by the zoom, xOffset and yOffset. We keep track of the zoomStep for the owner of this object

      • zoomStep

        private double zoomStep
        our image is a port-view onto a part of the complex plane. Which part is in view is controlled by the zoom, xOffset and yOffset. We keep track of the zoomStep for the owner of this object
